chinese: 授人以鱼不如授人以渔。
pinyin: Shòu rén yǐ yú bùrú shòu rén yǐ yú.
english: Giving someone a fish is not as good as teaching them to fish.
meaning: Teaching skills is better than giving temporary help.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Qiān lǐ zhī xíng, shǐ yú zú xià.
english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
meaning: Great achievements begin with small actions.
author: Laozi

pinyin: Dī shuǐ chuān shí.
english: Dripping water penetrates stone.
meaning: Persistent effort overcomes resistance.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 读万卷书不如行万里路。
pinyin: Dú wàn juǎn shū bùrú xíng wàn lǐ lù.
english: Reading ten thousand books is not as useful as traveling ten thousand miles.
meaning: Practical experience is more valuable than theoretical knowledge.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Bǎi wén bùrú yī jiàn.
english: Hearing a hundred times is not as good as seeing once.
meaning: Direct experience is more reliable than hearsay.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆。
pinyin: Xué ér bù sī zé wǎng, sī ér bù xué zé dài.
english: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
meaning: Balance study with reflection.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Zhī zú cháng lè.
english: Contentment brings constant happiness.
meaning: True happiness comes from appreciating what you already have.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shībài shì chénggōng zhī mǔ.
english: Failure is the mother of success.
meaning: Success is built on lessons from failure.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Sàiwēng shī mǎ, yān zhī fēi fú.
english: The old man lost his horse, but who knows if it's not a blessing?
meaning: A setback may turn out to be a good thing.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Sān rén xíng, bì yǒu wǒ shī yān.
english: When three walk together, one can be my teacher.
meaning: There is always something to learn from others.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Guāng yīn sì jiàn, rì yuè rú suō.
english: Time flies like an arrow; days and months like a shuttle.
meaning: Time passes quickly, so use it wisely.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yù sù zé bù dá.
english: Haste makes waste.
meaning: Rushing often leads to mistakes.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Hǎo shì duō mó.
english: Good things take time.
meaning: Great achievements often face challenges.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jūnzǐ zhī jiāo dàn rú shuǐ.
english: The friendship of a gentleman is as plain as water.
meaning: True friendship is simple and pure, not based on gain.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Yǒu zhì zhě, shì jìng chéng.
english: Where there is a will, there is a way.
meaning: Determination leads to success.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Mín yǐ shí wéi tiān.
english: The people regard food as heaven.
meaning: Food is the most important thing for the people.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jìn zhū zhě chì, jìn mò zhě hēi.
english: He who stays near vermilion gets stained red; he who stays near ink gets stained black.
meaning: A person's character is influenced by their surroundings.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jìng yǐ xiū shēn, jiǎn yǐ yǎng dé.
english: Cultivate yourself with tranquility, nurture virtue with frugality.
meaning: Discipline and simplicity strengthen character.
author: Zhuge Liang

pinyin: Jǐ suǒ bù yù, wù shī yú rén.
english: Do not impose on others what you yourself do not desire.
meaning: Treat others the way you want to be treated.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Xiǎo bù rěn zé luàn dà móu.
english: If small matters are not endured, great plans may be ruined.
meaning: Patience in small things is crucial for achieving big goals.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Huà shé tiān zú.
english: Drawing legs on a snake.
meaning: To ruin something by adding unnecessary details.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jǐng dǐ zhī wā.
english: A frog at the bottom of a well.
meaning: Someone with a limited outlook.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Zhǐ shàng tán bīng.
english: Discussing military tactics on paper.
meaning: Empty talk without practical experience.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yī jiàn shuāng diāo.
english: One arrow, two golden eagles.
meaning: To achieve two goals with one action.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shuǐ néng zài zhōu, yì néng fù zhōu.
english: Water can carry a boat; it can also overturn it.
meaning: The people can support or overthrow a ruler.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Wáng yáng bǔ láo, yóu wèi wǎn yě.
english: Mend the pen after the sheep are lost; it’s not too late.
meaning: It’s never too late to fix a problem.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Kǒu mì fù jiàn.
english: Honey in the mouth, a sword in the belly.
meaning: To be sweet in words but treacherous in actions.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Chē dào shān qián bì yǒu lù.
english: When the cart reaches the mountain, there will be a road.
meaning: Things will work out in the end.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Bīng mǎ wèi dòng, liáng cǎo xiān xíng.
english: Before the troops move, provisions must go first.
meaning: Preparation is essential before action.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Huà lóng diǎn jīng.
english: To paint a dragon and dot its eyes.
meaning: To add the crucial touch that brings something to life.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jìn shuǐ lóu tái xiān dé yuè.
english: The pavilion near the water gets the moonlight first.
meaning: Those with advantages get benefits first.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Qián shì bù wàng, hòu shì zhī shī.
english: Do not forget past events, they are teachers for the future.
meaning: Learn from past experiences to avoid repeating mistakes.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Dī shuǐ zhī ēn, dāng yǒng quán xiāng bào.
english: A drop of water shall be returned with a spring.
meaning: Even the smallest kindness should be repaid generously.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Nìng wéi yù suì, bù wéi wǎ quán.
english: Better to be shattered like jade than to be whole like tile.
meaning: It is better to die with honor than live in disgrace.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yù bàng xiāng zhēng, yú wēng dé lì.
english: When the snipe and the clam fight, the fisherman profits.
meaning: When two parties fight, a third party may benefit.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shòu yè jiě huò, huì rén bù juàn.
english: To teach and resolve doubts, never tiring in instructing others.
meaning: A true teacher is patient and tireless in guiding students.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Zhòng rén shí chái huǒ yàn gāo.
english: When everyone adds firewood, the flames rise high.
meaning: Teamwork makes tasks easier and more successful.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jūnzǐ bàochóu, shí nián bù wǎn.
english: A gentleman’s revenge is never too late, even after ten years.
meaning: Patience is key; timing matters in action.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Mǎn zhāo sǔn, qiān shòu yì.
english: Arrogance invites loss; humility brings benefit.
meaning: Staying humble brings growth, while pride leads to downfall.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 工欲善其事，必先利其器。
pinyin: Gōng yù shàn qí shì, bì xiān lì qí qì.
english: If a worker wants to do good work, he must first sharpen his tools.
meaning: Preparation is the key to success.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Táo lǐ bù yán, xià zì chéng qī.
english: Peach and plum trees do not speak, yet paths form beneath them.
meaning: A person’s virtue naturally attracts followers.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Bù rù hǔ xué, yān dé hǔ zǐ.
english: Without entering the tiger’s den, how can one obtain the cub?
meaning: Great rewards require taking risks.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Liáng yào kǔ kǒu, zhōng yán nì ěr.
english: Good medicine tastes bitter; honest advice is unpleasant to the ear.
meaning: Truth may be hard to accept, but it is beneficial.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Hǎi nà bǎi chuān, yǒu róng nǎi dà.
english: The sea can hold the water from a hundred rivers because of its capacity.
meaning: Greatness comes from tolerance and inclusiveness.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Qián rén zāi shù, hòu rén chéng liáng.
english: The previous generation plants the tree so the next generation enjoys the shade.
meaning: Future generations benefit from the hard work of those before them.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴。
pinyin: Yī cùn guāng yīn yī cùn jīn, cùn jīn nán mǎi cùn guāng yīn.
english: An inch of time is worth an inch of gold, but an inch of gold cannot buy an inch of time.
meaning: Time is more precious than money.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Wèi yǔ chóu móu.
english: Repair the house before it rains.
meaning: Take precautions before trouble comes.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shān bù zài gāo, yǒu xiān zé míng.
english: A mountain need not be high; if an immortal dwells there, it becomes famous.
meaning: Worth is not in size but in substance.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shù yù jìng ér fēng bù zhǐ.
english: The tree wishes for calm, but the wind does not cease.
meaning: Circumstances often prevent peace and quiet.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Qīng chū yú lán ér shèng yú lán.
english: Blue comes from indigo but is bluer than indigo.
meaning: Students can surpass their teachers.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Tángláng bǔ chán, huángquè zài hòu.
english: The mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind.
meaning: While preying on others, one may fall prey themselves.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 路遥知马力，日久见人心。
pinyin: Lù yáo zhī mǎ lì, rì jiǔ jiàn rén xīn.
english: Distance tests a horse’s strength, time reveals a person’s heart.
meaning: Time reveals true character.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yī yè zhàng mù, bù jiàn Tài Shān.
english: One leaf before the eye blocks the view of Mount Tai.
meaning: A small thing can blind one to the bigger picture.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 千里送鹅毛，礼轻情意重。
pinyin: Qiān lǐ sòng é máo, lǐ qīng qíng yì zhòng.
english: A goose feather sent from a thousand miles away, though light, carries deep affection.
meaning: The thought behind a gift is more important than its value.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 读书破万卷，下笔如有神。
pinyin: Dú shū pò wàn juàn, xià bǐ rú yǒu shén.
english: Read ten thousand books, and your writing will flow like a god’s.
meaning: Extensive reading improves one’s ability to write and create.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yán bì xìn, xíng bì guǒ.
english: Keep your word and be resolute in action.
meaning: A gentleman must be trustworthy and decisive.
author: Confucius

chinese: 天高任鸟飞，海阔凭鱼跃。
pinyin: Tiān gāo rèn niǎo fēi, hǎi kuò píng yú yuè.
english: The sky is high for birds to fly, the sea is wide for fish to leap.
meaning: Everyone has space to develop freely.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yī shī zú chéng qiān gǔ hèn.
english: One misstep can lead to a lifetime of regret.
meaning: A small mistake can have lasting consequences.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Bù pà màn, jiù pà zhàn.
english: Do not fear going slowly, only fear standing still.
meaning: Progress, no matter how slow, is better than stagnation.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 近水知鱼性，近山识鸟音。
pinyin: Jìn shuǐ zhī yú xìng, jìn shān shí niǎo yīn.
english: Living near water, one knows the nature of fish; near mountains, the sound of birds.
meaning: Knowledge comes from experience and environment.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Xiǎo dòng bù bǔ, dà dòng chī kǔ.
english: A small hole not mended will become a big hole causing suffering.
meaning: Fix small problems before they become big ones.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shù gāo qiān zhàng, luò yè guī gēn.
english: A tree may grow a thousand feet tall, but its leaves return to its roots.
meaning: No matter how far one goes, they will return home.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Xīng xīng zhī huǒ, kě yǐ liáo yuán.
english: A single spark can start a prairie fire.
meaning: Small beginnings can lead to great results.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Rén wú yuǎn lǜ, bì yǒu jìn yōu.
english: If a man has no long-term worries, he will soon face near-term troubles.
meaning: Planning ahead prevents immediate problems.
author: Confucius

pinyin: Yù bù zhuó, bù chéng qì.
english: Jade must be carved to become a gem.
meaning: People need education and training to become useful.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Qiān jūn yì dé, yī jiàng nán qiú.
english: It is easy to find a thousand soldiers, but hard to find a good general.
meaning: True leaders are rare and valuable.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Dǎ cǎo jīng shé.
english: Beat the grass and scare the snake.
meaning: To inadvertently alert an enemy by taking premature action.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jī quǎn bù níng.
english: Even the chickens and dogs are not at peace.
meaning: Total chaos and unrest.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Chī yī qiàn, zhǎng yī zhì.
english: Suffer a setback, gain wisdom.
meaning: Failures teach valuable lessons.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yuǎn qīn bù rú jìn lín.
english: A distant relative is not as helpful as a near neighbor.
meaning: Neighbors can be more reliable than faraway family.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Liú shuǐ bù fǔ, hù shū bù dù.
english: Running water does not rot, a door hinge never worms.
meaning: Constant activity prevents decay.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Sài xià qiū lái fēng jǐng yì.
english: In the frontier in autumn, the scenery is unique.
meaning: Different places have different experiences.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jiāng shān yì gǎi, běn xìng nán yí.
english: Rivers and mountains may change, but human nature is hard to alter.
meaning: A person’s true nature is difficult to change.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Gōng fū bù fù yǒu xīn rén.
english: Hard work pays off for those who are determined.
meaning: Effort and persistence bring results.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Hǔ fù wú quǎn zǐ.
english: A tiger father will not beget a dog son.
meaning: Children inherit the excellence of their parents.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Shān gāo shuǐ cháng.
english: The mountains are high and the rivers are long.
meaning: Virtue and kindness endure forever.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yàn què ān zhī hóng hú zhī zhì.
english: How can sparrows understand the ambition of swans?
meaning: Small-minded people cannot comprehend the aspirations of the great.
author: Sima Qian

pinyin: Shòu yè chuán dào jiě huò.
english: To teach knowledge, spread the way, and solve doubts.
meaning: A teacher’s duty is to impart wisdom and guidance.
author: Han Yu

pinyin: Yī yán jì chū, sì mǎ nán zhuī.
english: A word once spoken cannot be taken back even by four horses.
meaning: One must keep their promises and words.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Lù bù shí yí, yè bù bì hù.
english: People do not pick up lost items on the road; doors need not be locked at night.
meaning: Describes a society of great honesty and safety.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Jìn xiāng qíng gèng qiè.
english: Near home, one feels more timid.
meaning: The closer one gets to home, the more emotions arise.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 天时不如地利，地利不如人和。
pinyin: Tiān shí bù rú dì lì, dì lì bù rú rén hé.
english: Timing is not as important as geography, but geography is not as important as unity.
meaning: Harmony among people is the most crucial advantage.
author: Mencius

pinyin: Wù yǐ lèi jù, rén yǐ qún fēn.
english: Things gather by kind, people group by type.
meaning: People are drawn to those similar to themselves.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Bàn tú ér fèi.
english: Give up halfway.
meaning: Abandoning an effort before it is complete leads to failure.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Hè lì jī qún.
english: A crane standing among chickens.
meaning: A person who stands out as outstanding among ordinary people.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Yú gōng yí shān.
english: The foolish old man moves the mountains.
meaning: Perseverance can overcome any difficulty.
author: Liezi

pinyin: Hè cháng fú duǎn.
english: The crane is tall, the duck is short.
meaning: Everyone has their strengths and weaknesses.
author: Anonymous

chinese: 塞翁失马，安知非祸福相依。
pinyin: Sàiwēng shī mǎ, ān zhī fēi huò fú xiāng yī.
english: The old man lost his horse, who knows if disaster and blessing are not intertwined?
meaning: Good fortune and misfortune often come together.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Tiě chǔ chéng zhēn.
english: An iron pestle can be ground into a needle.
meaning: With perseverance, even the most difficult tasks can be achieved.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Táng bì dāng chē.
english: A mantis trying to stop a chariot.
meaning: Overestimating one’s strength when facing something much stronger.
author: Anonymous

pinyin: Fēng yǔ tóng zhōu.
english: Together in the same boat through wind and rain.
meaning: Facing difficulties together builds solidarity.
author: Anonymous
